about_the_game:
Taivas is a mysterious action roguelite, Dead Cells, rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired. set in a world of myth, and a time of magic. The destiny of a Canidae Kingdom rests on the shoulders of a young fox alike boy. His name… Joakim.

Use spells and special powers and weapons to explore, destroy and fight your way to the surface, the UpWorld, and even beyond... Sky will not be the limit on this marvelous adventure...

Story:


You are Joakim, a young fox alike boy with fluffy tail and large, pointed ears, Knight of the Kingdom of Canidae. Kingdom has lived in peace for a long, long time, but now all kind of creatures are attacking against the Kingdom. Advisor of the Monarchy, magician Mikio sends you to a dangerous travel to the UpWorld. You start your journey from a middle of the Earth and start your journey to the surface, and beyond...

Special playing style


The style of play of the game is different from the mainstream: you progress from the bottom up.

Features:

Game currently offers one quite small but fun level! (cave)
Save & Load function
2 Levels (Level 1 Cave: Part 1 and 2)
2 End Boss
1 Skill
1 Special Ablitiy
0 Special Powers
This First version offers 50-100 minutes fun

Unique main character

The game character is unique and hand drawn.

Game is in development, and there will be a lots of improvements to the current character, new enemies, new levels...
detailed_description:
TAIVAS demo has been release



Game has released and also TAIVAS demo is available for play!

This version of the Demo has not been updated to match the current build of the base game.

You can control the character with these buttons:

Hit = space
Arrow lef = move left
Arrow right = move right
Arrow up = jump
Arrow up two clicks = extra jump on the air
Arrow down = squat
Run = press left or right arrow button and press F
Special skills (when purchased) = numbers 1-4 and y, u, i, o, p

Have fun and feel free to post any comments and development ideas!

Best regards
TAIVAS development
